entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain showers or flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to rain showers or periods of drizzle late in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
